HP OVS.Commands: sudo ovs-vsctl add-br hp_br, sudo ovs-vsctl add-port hp_br enp4s0, sudo ovs-vsctl add-port hp_br enx000ec6c4fa90, sudo ip link set hp_br up, sudo ovs-vsctl set-controller hp_br tcp:10.20.30.55:6633, sudo ovs-vsctl  set bridge hp_br protocols=OpenFlow13
